2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Looks amazing so far. I have not been able to get the ZeroMail to work yet, but I assume it's still under development.

1_1Ao1FGCWvNNwf4Y4KMKJp9HgPbseU7gE31.body: Several good apps you can use for encrypted Voip, including Tox over Tor, or Bittorrent Bleep. Not sure if Bleep can be configured to work over Tor though.
Bleep can do VOIP from mobile device. Tox only works for text messaging from mobile device, but does video/audio from PC.
